description: eVerbatim, Inc. is a court reporter-owned company serving the profession in all its forms—judicial, freelance, captioning, and CART since 1991. We understand the unique demands of reporting from all perspectives: machine stenography, voice writing, CAT software, real-time communications, and all the many types of technology employed by our clients. We are equipped to meet your every need, whether it is a new computer, a new or used steno machine, software, cabling, or if you just need a question answered. We offer services and support to users of ALL CAT software. We have a team of knowledgeable technicians available to help you with virtually any technical problem. Technology can be challenging and confusing, and court reporters are often hard pressed to protect their computers from the threats of viruses and spyware. To keep you in business and on the job, we offer a wide range of hardware-support services, including new-computer setup, repair services, troubleshooting, and upgrades. We also offer remote diagnostics and can make some repairs over the Internet! We offer our clients a Personalized Computer Concierge Service because we know that choosing the right computer and setting it up properly can be daunting tasks, and it doesn't end there. If there are problems after purchase, you must deal with warranty technicians who have absolutely no idea what a court reporter is or does. It can feel like you're talking to someone who speaks a foreign language; and, alas, all too often you are! Serving our profession since 1991, eVerbatim understands the unique demands of court reporting. We don't just pluck computers off a warehouse or showroom shelf and ship them; we open each box and spend hours testing and configuring the computer, optimizing the settings for court reporters, and making sure it will perform maximally with ALL modern CAT software.
